pkgmetadata.longdescription: Unbiased Estimators for Cumulant Products // Methods and tools for estimate (joint) cumulants of a given population distribution using (multivariate) k-statistics and (multivariate) polykays,symmetric unbiased estimators with minimum variance. For more details see Di Nardo E., Guarino G., Senato D. (2009) arXiv:0807.5008.
